name: Chronac
description:
Chronac is a fast paced action-platformer with lots of acrobatics,
an arsenal of futuristic carnage, and two very determined robots.

Set in a robot manufacturing facility in 2053, it runs tests on its robots to
conclude which one is the perfect design. Fight to the last bit of metal
in a variety of areas where the only way to win is to outwit your opponent.

You can choose test yourself in 4 game modes :
  • Conquest
  • Deathmatch
  • Search and Deliver
  • Headquarters

Or you can choose to leave the program and try to escape this vast
facility with a security system that seems to know your every move,
your every decision. Can you beat the system that created you ?
Be prepared to question the reality that is set out for you in your mission to find answers.

Features :
  • Online, Lan or Split-Screen multiplayer
  • Challenging yet rewarding Single Player experience
  • Over 5 weapons and 2 different bots to aid you.
  • Custom multiplayer games with every tweak imaginable including :
    • Custom player health, damage and weapon rate of fire
    • Different map sizes for Conquest mode
    • Selectable weapon pickups and banning weapons
    • Custom total suitcase number for SnD mode.
